system.useTime:
Warp Focus: Once per game, the Navigator may force a single opponent to re-roll a successful test to resist the effects of "The Lidless Stare" Navigator Power
Pure Genes: Tests to avoid gaining mutation are +20 instead of +10.
Exalted Lineage: Gain +10 to any interaction skill test when dealing with Imperial Nobility.
Initial Mutation: Start with one chosen Navigator Mutation: Strangely Jointed Limbs, Elongated Form, Pale and Hairless Flesh, Eyes as Dark as the Void. Other mutations gained normally.
